itemDescription: Member of the United Kingdom Parliament (1902-1974)

wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Noel Furness (18 December 1902 – 14 April 1974), was a British barrister and Liberal National politician. He was Member of Parliament for Sunderland from 1935 to 1945. From 1938 to 1940 he was a junior Lord of the Treasury.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1935 United Kingdom general election
List of National Liberal Party (UK, 1931) MPs

response: * Sir Stephen Furness, 1st Baronet (1872–1914), ship-owner and Member of Parliament for The Hartlepools 1910–1914
* Stephen Furness (Sunderland MP) (1902–1974), Member of Parliament for Sunderland 1935–1945
